reviewText: As always Bob has won us over with his newest DVD.  First off, I must say I love the new CGI Animation that is used because it really makes the episodes bright, colorful, and more like regular animation.  Bob and his team work together to start and finish projects and there are some wonderful themes within the episodes.  I love how Bob is wholesome and yet not cheesy.  My sons love the trucks and how each one has its own talent.  This DVD also features Scratch who is a new character!  This is definitely a great DVD whether your child loves Bob the Builder or just loves trucks in general!
Title: N/A
